body.p: Hon Thos E Bramlett Sir we the undersigned Citizens hereby Petition to you to Release B. F. Smith & J. R. M. Roney Citizens of Pitts Point Bullett County Ky of the fine assesed against them by the grand Jury of the last Circuit Court of this County for selling whiskey with out lincense it appearing to our satisfaction that there license had expired but a few days ^and we believe^ that It was not there Intention to violate the law as we know them to be law abiding citizens and further that the guerrilas being numerous and troublesome in this section that it was allmost impossible for a man to attend to his business or travel around through his neighborhood with out being in danger of being murdered or or robed yrs truly

Petitioners Names
F. M Hardy
John Connell
James T Carlisle
Wm Snellen
G T Froman
G T Forman
Z Snellen
Alfred Collins
Thos R. Horrell
Chas Greenwell

George W Stone
Robert Scott
Joseph Carpenter
James ,H, Hardy
Over
Dr Sir From the information I have rec'd since judgement against Smith I am satisifed that the statements made in the within petition are true and I shall forgive him of one half of my commissions

Bullitt Cir Ct
Remit
Smith & Roney
$60
Tipling
28th Sept/65
